treatmentsData.title: Myers Cocktail Drip
treatmentsData.description: Recharge energy, enhance immunity, and support overall wellness with the Myers Cocktail.

treatmentsData.title: Luxe Super Drip
treatmentsData.description: Boost cognitive function, nutritional balance, and support peak performance with the proprietary Luxe Super Drip.

treatmentsData.title: Beauty Drip
treatmentsData.description: Full hydration plus add-ons to help rejuvenate skin health and enhance wellbeing with the Beauty Drip.

treatmentsData.title: Beauty Plus Drip
treatmentsData.description: Experience full hydration combined with premium add-ons crafted to revitalize skin health and elevate your overall wellbeing with the Beauty Plus Drip.

treatmentsData.title: Help Me Choose
treatmentsData.description: Not sure what the best drip is for you? Talk with one of our nurses on-site and get an expert opinion. Treatments are customized to your needs. No additional cost.

treatmentsData.title: Cold/Flu Drip
treatmentsData.description: Full hydration and effective, immediate treatments for your cold and flu symptoms: fatigue, body aches, chills, and fever.

treatmentsData.title: Migraine Drip

treatmentsData.title: Immunity Drip
treatmentsData.description: Stay proactive with the immunity drip, packed with essential vitamins to optimize your immune response.

treatmentsData.title: Immunity Plus Drip
treatmentsData.description: Enhance your defense with the Immunity Plus Drip, featuring a premium blend of vitamins and nutrients to maximize immune health.

lpVariants.name: nad
lpVariants.title: Luxe Mobile IV | NAD+ IV Therapy and Shots
lpVariants.introHead: NAD+ IV Therapy & Shots – Revitalize Your Body & Mind
lpVariants.introDesc: Boost your energy, improve focus, and support cellular health with NAD+ IV therapy and shots tailored to your needs.
lpVariants.ctaBenefits: 7am to 11pm appointments | Same-day NAD+ treatments available within 1 HOUR
lpVariants.benefitsSubtext: Experience the rejuvenating benefits of NAD+ therapy from the comfort of your home.
lpVariants.seoTitle: NAD+ IV Drip Therapy & Shots | Mobile IV Drip Treatment
lpVariants.seoDescription: Experience premium NAD+ IV Drip therapy & shots in USA. Trusted NAD IV treatment with great reviews. Boost energy, focus, and wellness today!

treatmentsData.title: NAD+ Shots
treatmentsData.description: Quick, targeted NAD+ shots (100–250 mg) to help boost energy, sharpen focus, and support cellular health—perfect for a fast wellness upgrade.

treatmentsData.title: NAD+ Drip
treatmentsData.description: NAD+ by IV for the best possible absorption. Starting at 250 mg. Additional NAD+ added for $75 per 100 mg up to 1000 mg total.

lpVariants.name: workplacehydration
lpVariants.title: Luxe Mobile IV
lpVariants.introDesc: Fast-acting IV hydration for high-intensity groups, providing rapid relief from dehydration and enabling quick return to peak performance.
lpVariants.ctaBenefits: 7am to 11 pm appointments | time slots available within 1 HOUR
lpVariants.seoDescription: Professional IV hydration for high-intensity groups, providing rapid relief from dehydration and enabling quick return to peak performance.

treatmentsData.title: Luxe Full Hydration IV
treatmentsData.description: Full hydration to help with dehydration. Add-ons available upon request during Physician consultation.

treatmentsData.title: Luxe Group Hydration IV (10+)
treatmentsData.description: Hydrate your team on-site. Our group service combats dehydration symptoms, with customizable add-ons during consultation. Ideal for construction, HVAC, and other active jobsite workers.
